existing_features.title: Create a minimal frontend shell with a coherent visual theme (colors, typography, spacing, and component styling) applied consistently across the app, without adding additional product features beyond a basic landing scaffold.

new_feature_requests.summary: Create a dart scoring backend service (API + data model)
Implement a Motoko backend canister that persists dart scoring data models and exposes a Candid API to manage games, players, and scoring events.
Provide API methods to create and query games and players, including the ability to start a new game with rules and retrieve game state by id.
Implement dart scoring logic and an API to record throws/turns and compute scores according to standard rules, including bust handling and optional double-out finishing.
Add backend-side validation, error handling, and deterministic IDs for stable operation (no traps on invalid input).
